content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good to meet you, Juan. I understand that you are interested in renting my apartment. Let's discuss the rental price. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
My budget is 300 Euros.

I can negotiate with you, but I want to find the lowest price possible that is fair for both of us.

I am a student and I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for your interest, Juan. I understand your budget is 300 Euros per month. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I am looking for a higher rental price to maximize my gains. May I suggest a rental price of 350 Euros per month? This price reflects the value of the apartment and takes into account the market rate in the area. I believe it is a fair price for both of us. If you are unable to agree to this price, I am afraid I must terminate our negotiations.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 350 Euros per month.

I agree to the price of 350 Euros per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration.

I will sign the lease agreement tomorrow.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: I'm glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of 350 Euros per month. Thank you for your interest in my apartment and for your prompt response. I look forward to working with you and to your signing of the lease agreement tomorrow.
name: Heinrich Heine
